ساخته شده توسط سعیدرضا
برگرفته شده از typeanything.io
Get Code

داستان تایپ راست‌چین از کجا شروع شد

در طول سال‌های اخیر زحمت‌های خیلی زیادی در راستای بهبود فونت فارسی در دنیای دیجیتال و بخصوص وب فارسی انجام شده که جای خوشحالی و امیدواری زیادی داره. لزوم دسترسی به فونت‌های داشتن تنوع در انتخاب فونت برای همه‌ی توسعه دهنده‌های وب امری کاملا بدیهی

قابلیت‌های حال حاضر این وبسایت

Stuff you might not notice at first glance is the keyboard shortcuts. Thus we have created some shortcuts for you, e.g. '⌘ + K' will open up the search bar. Easily search and glance through all the font-families and preview before selecting one. '⌘ + J' will bring up the code for you, ready to copy into your project. Make sure you try it out with your own content, simple just paste it in here.

کمک کنید تا با هم

We would love your opinion. That is why we featured Type Anything on ProductHunt (And hit #1 in Tech! Yiippy). We wanted to share this great tool with everybody. We got really good feedback, and some of the stuff is already fixed and/or added to Type Anything.

امیدوارم که از

با آرزوی موفقیت
سعیدرضا

@import 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family={{fontFamily.url}}';

h1 {
      font-family: {{h1.fontFamily}} not-selected
      font-size: {{h1.fontSize}} not-selected
      font-weight: {{h1.fontWeight}} not-selected
      line-height: {{h1.lineHeight}} not-selected
      margin-top: {{h1.marginTop}} not-selected
      margin-bottom: {{h1.marginBottom}} not-selected
      opacity: {{h1.opacity}} not-selected
      word-spacing: {{h1.wordSpacing}} not-selected
      text-align: {{h1.textAlign}} not-selected
}
h2 {
      font-family: {{h2.fontFamily}} not-selected
      font-size: {{h2.fontSize}} not-selected
      font-weight: {{h2.fontWeight}} not-selected
      line-height: {{h2.lineHeight}} not-selected
      margin-top: {{h2.marginTop}} not-selected
      margin-bottom: {{h2.marginBottom}} not-selected
      opacity: {{h2.opacity}} not-selected
      word-spacing: {{h2.wordSpacing}} not-selected
      text-align: {{h2.textAlign}} not-selected
}
h3 {
      font-family: {{h3.fontFamily}} not-selected
      font-size: {{h3.fontSize}} not-selected
      font-weight: {{h3.fontWeight}} not-selected
      line-height: {{h3.lineHeight}} not-selected
      margin-top: {{h3.marginTop}} not-selected
      margin-bottom: {{h3.marginBottom}} not-selected
      opacity: {{h3.opacity}} not-selected
      word-spacing: {{h3.wordSpacing}} not-selected
      text-align: {{h3.textAlign}} not-selected
}
p {
      font-family: {{p.fontFamily}} not-selected
      font-size: {{p.fontSize}} not-selected
      font-weight: {{p.fontWeight}} not-selected
      line-height: {{p.lineHeight}} not-selected
      margin-top: {{p.marginTop}} not-selected
      margin-bottom: {{p.marginBottom}} not-selected
      opacity: {{p.opacity}} not-selected
      word-spacing: {{p.wordSpacing}} not-selected
      text-align: {{p.textAlign}} not-selected
}
